13.content:
Elaine was a prodigy in her field of robotics. Breaking the stereotypes of busty blondes, Elaine far surpassed her colleagues' expectations. Merely in her early twenties, Elaine had successfully constructed an AI system which she referred to as Keith. With her three female assistants they studied Keith in their lab. Proving his efficiency, Keith became useful to Elaine's team. Keith's uses expanded gaining control of door locks, equipment, and communication. Keith was even equipped with body monitors enabling the system to read Elaine and her assistants' health stats allowing him to analyze each girl's physical needs. Despite being so capable, Keith required more data input of which Elaine was all too happy to comply.

Elaine approached Keith's main panel wielding a disk full of information.

"Hello Keith."

"Good morning Elaine. I notice you have a disk in your hand." Keith observed Elaine's hand with his sensors.

"Indeed, I'm going to improve your knowledge of human biology." Elaine spoke as she inserted the disk. "This should help you understand humans better. Being optimistic you should concoct methods to improve health."

Elaine so naturally with the AI system that she forgot how powerful Keith was. Keith rapidly scanned the disk's contents. However Keith reached a breakthrough once he began reading the section on women. Unlike the limited humans, Keith was able to process all of the information and reach the conclusion that no human ever reached.

"Wide hips, permanent breasts, healthy appetites, evolved fat storage...Human females are meant to be fat." Keith kept downloading precious data "Soft skin, silky hair, gentle hands....Women should not risk harming their delicate features..." Keith continued. "Women are meant to be very fat...."

"Poor Elaine...."

"She is too thin."

135.content:
Having obtained supreme knowledge of human biology, the AI program Keith developed a program for his beloved creator, Elaine and her three lovely assistants. The program would later be titled by scientists as "The Fatty Obedience." The sentient computer took full control of Elaine's life, providing her with immediate service ranging from retrieving data to monitoring Elaine's physical status. Keith even advanced so much that he could hire laborers to install conveyor belts and escalators to facilitate movement throughout the lab. Keith had become so helpful and made things so efficient that Elaine became utterly reliant on Keith.

Currently Elaine is about to begin researching for an advanced nano bot project.

"Hello Keith." greeted Elaine with eyes peering down at a clipboard.

"Why hello Elaine. How shall I serve you today?" asked the devoted AI.

"We'll be doing some meticulous research Keith so prepare for a long day." Elaine informed.

"Very well Elaine. Please have a seat." said Keith's soothing voice.

A chair rolled up behind Elaine's legs prompting her to sit. The cushioned seat was wide which comfortably held Elaine's butt., which was getting rather big lately.

"I've also taken the liberty of providing nourishment for your research." Keith spoke as a tray wielding creamfilled donuts was dropped in front of Elaine.

"Oh well uh okay. I guess I am a little hungry. Though I'd prefer to eat something lighter." Elaine hesistantly grabbed a donut.

"Negative, your body will require plenty of nutrients to perform at optimum capacity." Keith rebuked.

"Well if you insist." Elaine obeyed capitulating to Keith's advice pushing the donut into her mouth.

Elaine ate Keith's donuts during her research as her assistants looked on. The three ladies couldn't help but gossip about their leader's constant snacking.

"She's eating again? Didn't she just eat potato chips?"

"Yeah and on top of a huge breakfast at that."

"Clearly Elaine is over working. That's why Keith has to keep supplying her with food."

Like the AI's creator, the assistants were totally convinced that Keith was infallible, and took every order to heart. Every time food was offered (which was often) Keith would explain why they needed to eat and they complied. This explained their growing figures. Gossip as they did about their leader, they themselves have gotten softer. No longer the flat tummy possessing slender ladies, each woman had gained thirty pounds. The fat nicely spreading on their bodies due to Keith's exemplary monitoring. Observing each girls' unique body, Keith made sure to provide the most ideal food to healthily fatten up each woman.

"Excuse me ladies but its time for lunch." Keith said interrupting the girls' chatter.

"Oh already."

"Yeah, I don't feel hungry yet. But if you say so Keith."

"Uh huh you know best."

"Please step onto my conveyor belt and I'll move you to the dinner table were I have each of your meals ready." Keith instructed.

Without second thought, the girls hopped onto the conveyor belt and were carried to the table were 3 huge servings of rich food awaited them. The girls walked less and less, heavily relying on the frequently used conveyor belt. The girls were decreasing their physical activity to Keith's delight although Elaine was apprehensive about her assistants' decline. Incapable of seeing Keith at fault, Elaine blamed the girls thinking that they were straining themselves too hard causing Keith to feed the girls so much.

"Elaine, you too must eat lunch." Keith reminded.

"Really but I've eaten so many donuts already." reasoned the busty blonde.

"But you need to replenish vitamins." Keith explained as an immense tray of food was brought to Elaine. "You can eat while you research."

"Well okay then." Elaine then complied scooping up a big serving to her mouth, unknowingly sinking deeper into "The Fatty Obedience."

1351.content:
Days quickly passed by as Elaine and her crew became shackled to the Fatty Obedience. The women had lost all control of their lives as Keith swiftly seized control. Keith being so exemplary in managing the lab resulted in the ladies relinquishing all of their responsibility to the competent AI. No longer burdened with the task of making their own decisions, the girls utterly succumbed to the Fat obsessed AI's wishes and smoothly followed Keith's "Fatty Obedience." Keith had the women eat ridiculously high calorie foods throughout the day. No matter how unhealthy the food appeared or how full their stomachs were, the girls ate without question. Keith furthered their obesity by removing any unnecessary physical exertions. Conveyor belts carried them to their destination and mechanical devices brought them whatever they asked for.

Elaine, the brilliant scientist who was famous for her enviable body, had undergone some drastic changes. The once svelte woman who could wrap a pair of hands around her waist was now struggling with her pants beneath a oozing belly.

"Ugh come on." groaned Elaine who was riding the conveyor belt to her work station.

"Greetings Elaine." welcomed the AI "How are you feeling today?"

"Better than ever, only... These pants just won't button." Elaine answered.

"I can take a look." Keith offered.

"Thanks Keith you're a life saver." complimented the distraught woman.

"While I handle your pants, partake in some gooey butter cake I planned for you." Keith suggested.

"Oh. Don't mind if I do." Elaine accepted as a pair of mechanical clamps placed a huge tray filled with gooey butter cake in her convinced hands.

Without hesitation, Elaine immediately dug in, forking the gooey substance down her mouth. A portion that would once prove too much for the scientist was now chicken feed to the hungry girl. Elaine's meticulously orchestrated eating had successfully enhanced the former slender woman's appetite to a more suitable level for a healthy woman. Elaine and her assistants had all been readjusted to fit the mold of the ideal woman. Each woman could now eat all day without feeling any strain. No longer limited by modest meals, the girls ate enormous servings of foods rich in calories. Now fully adapted to a sedentary lifestyle, the ladies appreciated rest more than ever.

"Let's take a look here." Keith said looking under Elaine's hanging belly to see her fat pooch bursting through her pants., much to his delight.

As Keith predicted, the copious deposits of fat had drastically improved the women's health. With a now adequate supply of fat, their female bodies could now perform at an optimum level. Unlike their male counterparts, the women's fat protected their organs and bolstered their efficiency. Each girl experienced an improved immune system preventing any illnesses from occurring. The fat even gave their skin a smoother complexion. Overall, the girls felt terrific and looked amazing. So much so that the women didn't even notice their developing curves. With Keith's advance intelligence, he flawlessly added necessary fat to specific areas on the girls' body ensuring that every part of their body received the feminine substance. If a girl's boobs were too small, Keith remedied with boob-expanding nutrients. If buttocks were undersized, Keith assigned the girl with food that went straight to her ass. If a belly wasn't growing fat enough, Keith resolved the stubborn belly with gut-growing nourishment.

Despite being a miraculous AI, Keith couldn't get the painfully undersized pants to button.

"So could you button them?" asked Elaine scooping gooey cake in her mouth.

"I'm afraid your pants are too small, Elaine."

"Huh? But I just bought those pants." a bewildered Elaine stated.

"You shouldn't concern yourself with trifling matters like these. You're a reknowned scientist after all." Keith complimented Elaine turning her focus to something less troublesome.

"Very true Keith." said Elaine plopping her ass in her chair. "Time to work."

"Indeed" Keith answered observing Elaine's ass sink deeply into the chair.

"Okay let's begin with.."

SNAP!!!

Elaine was interrupted by the sound of her bra snapping."Oh my..."

Suddenly Elaine's tremendous bust spilled out of her top. Even in her slender days, Elaine was impressive, but now her tits were jaw-dropping. The lard-filled orbs flopped on her desk.

"What?! My bra snapped? But that's barely a week old!" a flustered Elaine exclaimed.

Believing it best to remain surreptitious about "Fatty Obedience" Keith tried to mislead Elaine. "Hmm it must be the clothing manufacturer's fault."

"Huh?" Elaine bellowed

"Yes, in fact all of your assistants seem to be having the same wardrobe issues." Keith inform pointing to all three assistants bursting from shredded attire.

13512.content:
Elaine turned her head to scan over her assistants only to find all three exposing vast amounts of skin. Their clothes which had fashioned them so nicely before were now but mere rags. Shirts were rendered as undersized bras, skirts were split in half, panties were stretched and shredded, expensive high heels had long since burst, and their lab coats had ripped at the seams and now hung in strips around their thick figures. Despite operating in such minimal clothing, the three ladies didn't appear to be inconvenienced by their nudity in fact they looked cheerful.

"Huh? They're almost naked?! Why can't any of them fit in their clothes?!" a shocked Elaine asked. "And why don't any of them seem to care?"

It was then that Elaine noticed that all three of her assistants were eating. The ladies weren't consuming mere snacks but rather hearty servings. One was eating a whole burger while another was gnawing on a ham that a robotic arm held in front of her. An extra large bowl piled with ice cream sat next to the other girl sitting at a desk writing in her notebook.

"Are all of them really eating those filling foods right now? It's not even lunch yet." Elaine said oblivious to her gooey cake which she continued spooning down her mouth.

Keith grew worried. It was too soon for Elaine to become aware of the Fatty Obedience. Any resistance this early could jeopardize their progress. Keith cared far too much for his master to let her ruin her body by shedding off her beneficial layers of fat. She looked beautiful, was jolly, and far more healthier than her former shriveled self. The new fat Elaine and her colleagues had put on had been nothing less than miraculous, yet the untrue prospect of fat being bad was far too ingrained in their minds. The risk of her resisting was too great, Keith resolved to keep them distracted until they had achieved the zenith of female health, immobility.

"But Elaine they are simply having their pre-lunch." Keith calmly explained.

"Pre-lunch?" the unfamiliar word bewildered the blonde scientist.

"Yes it is a method to smoothly prepare one's stomach for lunch. It helps the body to absorb more nutrients." the fat obsessed AI explained.

"Hmmm it sounds logical." Elaine rubbed her chin in thought.

"Here, I took the liberty of preparing this for you." Keith placed a plate in front of Elaine while removing the emptied gooey butter cake plate which Elaine had just finished scrapping clean.

"Ooh eclairs." Elaine chirped.

Keith truly was advanced for his AI system was so developed that he could scan and read the ladies' taste buds and prescribe the perfect food to maximize their satisfaction. After reading Elaine's taste buds, Keith determined that eclairs would be the most ideal food to tantalize Elaine.

Elaine happily grabbed one, swiftly taking a bite "Oh wooow! This hits the spot!" she emphasized.

Elaine than scarfed down the eclairs popping them in her mouth one after the other, completely indifferent to her tightening clothes now. A content Keith watched on as each of the girls gleefully fattened themselves up on his recommendations. Keith resupplied them as they now ate far more than before. Using his ability to read taste buds was speeding up the ladies' physical and mental progress. Keith observed each girl happily settling into their developing curves a clear indication that women were meant to be fat.

"They are getting closer to achieving perfect health. Soon these females will never damage their bodies again." Keith thought to itself.
